DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether investigational zoster vaccine comparable immune response ( body 's ability protect disease ) safety profile give concomitantly another vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigational Zoster Vaccine Subjects With History Varicella ( Chickenpox ) Given Concomitantly With Another Vaccine ( V211-011 )
DOC.criteria: Adults 50 year age old Prior history Herpes Zoster ( shingle ) Prior receipt varicella zoster vaccine Immunosuppressed
